summary: In the arid 1920s Australian Outback, a Catholic priest and the beautiful granddaughter of a vast sheep station owner stand powerless before God's will, tormented by desire. How far are they willing to go in the name of love?
cast: Richard Chamberlain|Rachel Ward|Christopher Plummer|Bryan Brown|Brett Cullen|Stephanie Faracy|Barry Corbin|John de Lancie|Barbara Stanwyck|Jean Simmons|Piper Laurie|Earl Holliman|Philip Anglim|John Friedrich|Stephen W. title: El pájaro espino
